Jan 7 (Reuters) -

  • AMAZON.COM SAYS UPDATING CO'S COVID-19 ISOLATION AND QUARANTINE POLICY TO ONE WEEK FROM WHEN EMPLOYEE TAKES THE TEST, WITH UP TO 40 HOURS PAID LEAVE
